title: Steve McQueen
summary: Terrence Stephen McQueen (March 24, 1930 – November 7, 1980), known as Steve McQueen in his film career,[4] nicknamed the "King of Cool" (during moto races used alias Harvey Mushman), was an American actor. His antihero persona, emphasized during the height of the counterculture of the 1960s, made him a top box-office draw for his films of the 1960s and 1970s.
